name: 洪英傑
objective:
本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法，其內容包含：(1) 一階二階及高階常微分方程，(2) 聯立常微分方程，(3) 常微分方程之冪級數解，(4) 拉普拉斯轉換。本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法，其內容包含：(1) 一階二階及高階常微分方程，(2) 聯立常微分方程，(3) 常微分方程之冪級數解，(4) 拉普拉斯轉換.　　
This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.
